pages.text: Various metallic minerals can be naturally found underground:$(br)$(li)$(l:materials/ore_metals/iron)Iron$()$(li)$(l:materials/ore_metals/gold)Gold$()$(li)$(l:materials/ore_metals/copper)Copper$()$(li)$(l:materials/ore_metals/lead)Lead$()
These minerals can then be processed into more refined materials and components suitable for a multitude of applications, along with tools and in some cases armour.
